raw_text: PEIRIS – SUNIMAL (Chairman,​ SPERRYS Commercial Equipment Pvt Ltd). Beloved husband of Priyani,​ loving father of Sanjaka and Minoli,​ son of late Gerad and Irene Peiris of Wennappuwa,​ brother of Prof. Antoinette Perera,​ Neville and of the late Michael and Daphne. Remains lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s,​ Colombo from Monday,​ 20th Nov. 2023 from 6.00 p.m. to 9.30 p.m. and Tuesday,​ 21st Nov. from 9.00 a.m. onwards. Cortege leaves parlour at 3.30 p.m. for cremation (Old Crematorium) at 4.00 p.m. at General Cemetery,​ Borella.076001
